ai.summary: Beach Avenue is a very short, easy coastal stroll in the UK. At 0.1 km, it follows a flat, scenic path along the shoreline, making it ideal for a quick outing with ocean views.
ai.terrain_summary: Flat and accessible terrain along a beach promenade. Likely a mix of boardwalk, paved path, and compact sand near the shoreline. Open to sea breeze and potential wet patches.
ai.safety_notes: Be mindful of tides and slippery surfaces when wet. Stay on the designated path and watch for pedestrians. Protect yourself from sun and wind with sunscreen and a hat; stay hydrated. Check local beach warnings for closures or dangerous conditions.
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn are ideal in the UK, with Mayâ€“September offering the best combination of warmth and daylight. The route is still suitable in winter for a short stroll if the weather is mild.

seo.title: Beach Avenue: Easy 0.1 km Coastal Walk in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover Beach Avenue, a short and flat 0.1 km coastal walk in the UK. Perfect for a quick, relaxed outing with ocean views.
